amendment.description: To permit the National Park Service to rehabilitate historic buildings in the New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park that were severely damaged by fire.

vote.text: Amendment SA 28 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 28 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S1431-1433; text: CR S1432) To permit the National Park Service to rehabilitate historic buildings in the New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park that were severely damaged by fire.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 28 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 28 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kennedy.
